edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.util

Interface State<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IncrementalEvaluationMetric<TK,FV>, IncrementalNBestEvaluationMetric<TK,FV>, NgramPrecisionIncrementalMetric<TK,FV>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BLEUMetric.BLEUIncrementalMetric, DTUHypothesis, Hypothesis, LinearCombinationMetric.LCIncrementalMetric, MultiTranslationState, NISTMetric.NISTIncrementalMetric, PERMetric.PERIncrementalMetric, TERMetric.TERIncrementalMetric, WERMetric.WERIncrementalMetric

    public interface State<T>
extends Comparable<T>
    Marks classes that can be placed on Beam objects
    Author:
    danielcer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(T o)
      Compare to object o first based on the relative score assigned to this object and object o, and then, on equality of score, compares o and the current object based on object identity.
      int depth() 
      State<T> parent() 
      double partialScore()
      Score assigned to the current state w.r.t the future cost heuristic
      double score()
      Score assigned to the current state, including future cost heuristic if applicable.

    • Method Detail

      • compareTo

        int compareTo(T o)
        Compare to object o first based on the relative score assigned to this object and object o, and then, on equality of score, compares o and the current object based on object identity. The latter ensures that o1.compareTo(o2) is never zero unless o1 == o2.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<T>

      • score

        double score()
        Score assigned to the current state, including future cost heuristic if applicable.

      • partialScore

        double partialScore()
        Score assigned to the current state w.r.t the future cost heuristic

      • parent

        State<T> parent()

      • depth

        int depth()
